JAMBO release note
Wow that was fun!!!! First thing&#039;s first thanks to NRG from whom I borrowed the audio also to the Russian source who ever they maybe for the video. Also MAD respects to Steviejks for pointing me in the right directions also your a legend mate. Ok I know there is a French and Spanish source floating but I got my hands on this first and I think it&#039;s all good. The first thing was to strip the audio from the NRG and then sync it to the Russian this took about 15 cuts so was not too bad. Also there is obviously English subs needed for some non English speaking parts so unfortunately there is no subs just the Russian ones instead, nothing I could do about that. The audio is not too bad a bit of rustling everynow and then but nothing too major. The video was quite good also but a little dark and way too much blue. I have tonned the blue right down and added more red and yellow. Also I have brightened it up and added a tiny bit of contrast, but I have tried to remove white spots also. Anyways please check out the sample and the screenshots before downloading!
